text: Do you frequently forget appointments or important dates?
Have you noticed a decline in your motivation or interest in previously enjoyable activities?
Do you frequently misplace items like keys or glasses?
Twitching or tremor in hands and legs when resting?
Difficulty coordinating visual inputs and hand movements?
Difficulty with balance, or balance that is noticeably worse on one side?
Do you feel irritable, nervous, shaky or light-headed between meals?
Noticeable difference in energy levels throughout the day?
